name: Reiserkampf
description:
SUMMARY

A dying soldier is looking to escape from No Man's Land, and he's willing to team up with anyone to do so.

Collect fuel for the Reiser and escape on the railways!

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys - Character Movement, Move Reiser (Right key only, uses fuel).

W - Fire (Near enemy only, uses ammo) .

S - Enter/Exit Reiser, Interact.

AD - Switch Characters.

CREDITS

The game was made under 48 hours for Bonfire Jam. The theme is "You can't do it alone."

All assets (except background wind sound) were made by me.

Background wind sound by Audio Enabled.

NOTE: Due to time constraints, the game does not feature any music.
